page.title: 13LIFE STYLES, VILLAGE LIFE
page.content: Mrs P. is 78 years old and lives in Bulls Cross Cottage. She was born in a house just up the road and not in a hospital unlike today where most babies are born. Bulls Cross village has never changed which is very unusual in this day and age, because changes in our environment are always happening. A local man bought Bulls Cross Cottage for Â£50 but a few years ago it was worth over Â£47,000 so now it is worth much more. Bulls cross is a green belt area which means it is protected and cannot be built on or changed. Bulls Cross Cottage was built in 1916 but is one of the newest houses in the village the others being far older. Mrs P. said if she had a chance she would get rid of all the traffic in the area.
